excerpt: "AWS is excited to announce that The Washington Post is integrating Amazon Polly to provide their readers with audio access to stories across The Post’s entire spectrum of web and mobile platforms, starting with technology stories. Amazon Polly&nbsp;is a service that turns&nbsp;text&nbsp;into lifelike&nbsp;speech,"
